room_title: Escape room "Red Scare" by Clue'd In Escape Rooms in Columbus
room_description:
It’s the 1980’s and Cold War tensions have been escalating between the superpowers. State-sponsored espionage and political influence are at its highest point in decades. The President is seeking re-election and campaigning in the local area.
As a member of an elite FBI Investigative team, you’ve been tasked to explore reports of unusual activities at a local business. With less than an hour until the president’s visit, will you expose the plot and solve the mystery?
